sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import img1 from '../assets/grid1.jpg' import img2 from '../assets/grid2.jpg' import img3 from '../assets/grid3.jpg' import img4 from '../assets/grid4.jpg' import './MainGrid.css' const MainGrid = () => { return ( {/* Main Row with two columns */} {/* Left Side: Single Image */} {/* Right Side: Two rows of images */} {/* First Row: Two Images */} {/* Second Row: Single Image */} ) } export default MainGrid
